class.name: PIXI.CanvasBuffer

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: the width for the newly created canvas

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: the height for the newly created canvas

class.help: Creates a Canvas element of the given size.

public.name: resize
public.help: Resizes the canvas to the specified width and height.

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: the new width of the canvas

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: the new height of the canvas

private.name: clear
private.help: Clears the canvas that was created by the CanvasBuffer class.

public.name: canvas
public.help: The Canvas object that belongs to this CanvasBuffer.

public.name: context
public.help: A CanvasRenderingContext2D object representing a two-dimensional rendering context.

public.name: height
public.help: The height of the Canvas in pixels.

public.name: width
public.help: The width of the Canvas in pixels.
